items.name: ghost
items.description: spawn floating command terminal pane (interactive zrf)

items.name: gitpod.zellij
items.description: Zellij plugin for Gitpod, with .gitpod.yml tasks integration

items.name: grab
items.description: A fuzzy finder (files, structs, enums, functions) for Rust devs

items.name: harpoon
items.description: quickly navigate panes (clone of nvim's harpoon)

items.name: jbz (Just Bacon Zellij)
items.description: display your just commands wrapped in bacon

items.name: monocle
items.description: fuzzy find of file names and contents

items.name: multitask
items.description: a mini-CI as a Zellij plugin

items.name: room
items.description: quickly search and switch tabs ðŸ–¤

items.name: vim-zellij-navigator
items.description: Seamless navigation with vim in zellij

items.name: zbuffers
items.description: a minimal and convenient way to switch between tabs, inspired by Emacs vertico-buffers and Zellij session-manager

items.name: zellij-autolock
items.description: Automatically lock Zellij depending on the command in the focused pane. Seamless navigation for Vim and more. Pairs well with [zellij.vim](https://github.com/fresh2dev/zellij.vim).

items.name: zellij-bookmarks
items.description: manage command bookmarks and quickly insert them into the terminal

items.name: zellij-cb
items.description: a customizable compact bar for Zellij

items.name: zellij-choose-tree
items.description: quickly switch between sessions, inspired by tmux choose-tree

items.name: zellij-datetime
items.description: adds a date and time pane to your Zellij

items.name: zellij-favs
items.description: adds a way to save favorites sessions and flush the others

items.name: zellij-forgot
items.description: swiftly present and access your keybinds (and more)

items.name: zellij-getmode
items.description: a simple utility plugin that gets the current input mode of zellij

items.name: zellij-jump-list
items.description: navigate your motions from pane-to-pane (similar to Vim, Neovim, and Emacs jump list)

items.name: zellij-load
items.description: show system resources such as CPU, memory and GPU usage

items.name: zellij-newtab-plus
items.description: create named tabs and navigate using zoxide in one keybind

items.name: zellij-nvim-nav-plugin
items.description: Another plugin for seamless navigation with neovim/vim windows

items.name: zellij-pane-picker
items.description: quickly switch, star, and jump to panes with customizable keyboard shortcuts

items.name: zellij-playbooks
items.description: browse, select, and execute commands from playbook files directly in the terminal

items.name: zellij-qr-share
items.description: show a web token as a QR code in the terminal for fast mobile authentication in the web UI

items.name: zellij-sessionizer
items.description: create sessions based on folder names

items.name: zellij-switch
items.description: switching between sessions in CLI using `zellij pipe`

items.name: zellij-what-time
items.description: shows host system date and/or time in the status bar. Inspired by zellij-datetime

items.name: zellij-workspace
items.description: apply layouts to current session

items.name: zj-docker
items.description: display docker containers and perform basic operations

items.name: zj-git-branch
items.description: Manage git branches

items.name: zj-quit
items.description: a friendly `quit` plugin for zellij

items.name: zj-status-bar
items.description: an opinionated fork of the compact-bar plugin

items.name: zjpane
items.description: Navigate between zellij panes easily

items.name: zjstatus
items.description: a configurable, themeable statusbar plugin

items.name: zjstatus-hints
items.description: adds mode-aware key binding hints to zjstatus

items.name: zjswitcher
items.description: automatically switch between normal mode and locked mode

items.name: zsm
items.description: A zoxide-integrated session switcher with support for default layouts

items.name: fzf-zellij
items.description: Shell script to start fzf in a Zellij floating pane.

items.name: opencode-zellij-namer
items.description: AI-powered dynamic session naming for [OpenCode](https://opencode.ai), automatically renames sessions based on project context

items.name: theylix
items.description: Zellij, Helix, and various cli tools ([Yazi](https://github.com/sxyazi/yazi), [Lazygit](https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit), [LazySQL](https://github.com/jorgerojas26/lazysql), [Slumber](https://github.com/LucasPickering/slumber), [Serpl](https://github.com/yassinebridi/serpl), `git blame` via [Tig](https://github.com/jonas/tig)) as a zen-mode IDE

items.name: yazelix
items.description: zellij, yazi and nushell adding a File Tree to Helix & helix-friendly keybindigs for zellij!

items.name: zeco
items.description: Share your zellij session over the internet, easy and secure!

items.name: zellij-sessionizer
items.description: A fuzzy finder-powered project switcher for Zellij sessions, inspired by [ThePrimeagen/tmux-sessionizer](https://github.com/ThePrimeagen/tmux-sessionizer)

items.name: zellix
items.description: A nushell wrapper over helix that leverages the power of zellij to turn it into a plugin system!

items.name: zide
items.description: Zellij layouts + bash scripts to create an IDE-like file picker and editor workflow that works in any shell and with most any visual file pickers!
